name: Nasy
introduction: from Thurm Associates. We are conducting a market research study and would like to ask you a few questions.

industry_involvement.question: Do you or does any member of your family or close friends work in any of the following industries?
industry_involvement.action_if_yes: Terminate and record on call record sheet

previous_interview.question: Have you been interviewed by a market research company in the past 6 months?
previous_interview.action_if_yes: Terminate and record on call record sheet

age_group.question: Please look at this card and tell me into which age group you fall?
age_group.action_if_under_21_or_refused: Terminate and record on call record sheet

smoking_habit.question: During the past week have you smoked a total of 3 packs of cigarettes or more?
smoking_habit.action_if_yes: Terminate and record on call record sheet

cigarette_brand.question: What brand of cigarettes do you smoke most often?
cigarette_brand.action_if_not_qualified: Terminate and record on call record sheet

menthol_preference.question: Is this brand a menthol or non-menthol cigarette?
menthol_preference.action_if_menthol: Terminate and record on call record sheet
